issue.title: [C++] Add support for PFOR integer compression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1099](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1099). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/lemire/FastPFor

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1099?focusedCommentId=16974184) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Do we want to keep this open?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1099?focusedCommentId=16974818) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
I would rather discuss this a possible follow-up to the compression proposal I have out, so lets close for now.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1099?focusedCommentId=17585999) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
